text:
Norman Lear honoured at Sundance festival

Sundance filmmakers and their supporters on Thursday broke bread together at the film festival’s annual dinner celebration.

Ava DuVernay, Jon Hamm, Casey Affleck, Zosia Mamet and Nick Jonas were among the artists dining with Sundance donors at the private event.

Television writer and producer Norman Lear, 93, was the guest of honour, attending the dinner after the documentary about his life, Norman Lear – Another Version of You , premiered as the festival’s opening night film. Lear said the film “startled and stunned and thrilled me.” — AP
title: Judd Apatow plays proud papa, Norman Lear honored
